name: Alfred Chicken
storyline: Eggs have been disappearing in the wild and wacky town of Pecklesville. As the player watches in horror, giant eggs with eyes are snatched by an unseen kidnapper. Enter Alfred Chicken, who seeks to rescue the eggs while travelling through a series of bizarre levels full of balloons, telephones, cheese and other strange elements.
summary: Alfred Chicken is a side-scrolling adventure game created by Twilight for a number of different platforms, including the Nintendo Entertainment System, the Amiga, and Gameboy. It has since been redeveloped and released on the Playstation.
